```{python}
import pandas as pd

pd.set_option("display.max_rows", 5)

from siuba.data import penguins, penguins_raw
from siuba import filter
```

## Basics


This function keeps rows of data that meet all specified conditions.

For example, the code below keeps rows where species is "Adelie" and year is 2007.

```{python}
filter(penguins, _.species == "Adelie", _.year == 2007)
```

## OR conditions

```{python}
filter(penguins, (_.species == "Adelie") | (_.year == 2007))
```

## Missing values

```{python}
filter(penguins, _.sex.isna())
```

```{python}
filter(penguins, ~_.sex.isna())
```
